step-1.project_name: Intercompany Invoice Line Update and Vendor Bill Automation
step-1.change_summary: Added division support for vendor bills to enable proper classification of intercompany transactions within the organization's divisional structure. This enhancement allows for more granular financial reporting and ensures that intercompany transactions are correctly categorized in the general ledger by division.

version-history-body.change_summary: Automates the end-to-end handling of intercompany transactions through two integrated scripts that work in sequence. The solution first standardizes invoice line items with appropriate items for correct GL impact while preserving original item information, then automatically generates corresponding vendor bills with configurable field mappings that respect subsidiary relationships. This initial version eliminates manual processing steps previously required after CSV imports, ensures consistent GL posting through standardized items, maintains proper transaction linkages for financial reporting, and includes flexible configuration options through custom records that define subsidiary relationships, field mappings, and item substitution rulesâ€”all with built-in status tracking and optional subsidiary filtering capabilities.

Added division support for vendor bills to enable proper classification of intercompany transactions within the organization's divisional structure. This enhancement allows for more granular financial reporting and ensures that intercompany transactions are correctly categorized in the general ledger by division.

step-2.story_description: Automatically assigns appropriate division to vendor bills and their line items based on configuration, ensuring proper classification of intercompany transactions.
step-2.feature_description: Assigns appropriate division to vendor bills and line items based on configuration
step-2.usage_description: Vendor bills are assigned the configured division for proper GL classification

user-stories-body.story_description: The script automates the standardization of invoice line items after CSV import to update invoice line items with standardized information, set default items based on subsidiary relationships, and prepare invoices for vendor bill creation.
Creates vendor bills automatically from processed invoices, maps invoice information to vendor bill fields, handles intercompany relationships, and sets standardized field values.
Automatically assigns appropriate division to vendor bills and their line items based on configuration, ensuring proper classification of intercompany transactions.

After invoices are imported, the Invoice Line Update script standardizes line items
Once invoices are processed, vendor bills are automatically created based on configuration
Vendor bills are assigned the configured division for proper GL classification

details.description: This script standardizes intercompany invoice line items imported via CSV. It identifies invoices through configurable saved searches, replaces line items with default items based on subsidiary/customer combinations while preserving original item information, marks processed invoices with status flags, and prepares them for vendor bill creation. The script supports optional subsidiary filtering for targeted processing

parameters.parameter_description: Specifies which configuration record to use for processing invoice lines
Optional filter to process only specific subsidiary's invoices

deploymentRecords.deployment_notes: Daily deployment for West End Express subsidiary

details.description: This script automates the creation of intercompany vendor bills from processed invoices. It identifies eligible invoices through saved searches, creates vendor bills with the correct subsidiary/vendor relationships, maps fields from invoice to vendor bill according to configurable mappings (both global and subsidiary-specific), sets standard values for approval status and department, establishes transaction linkage, and includes detailed logging of processing results.

parameters.parameter_description: Links to the master configuration record for vendor bill creation

Sets the default location for all vendor bills

customRecords.name: Intercompany Main Settings
customRecords.description: Primary configuration hub that links saved searches, subsidiary settings, and field mappings. This record defines which saved searches are used to identify invoices for processing and serves as the central point of reference for all subsidiary relationships and field mappings.

customRecords.name: Intercompany Subsidiary Line Settings
customRecords.description: Defines the relationships between subsidiaries for intercompany transactions. This record maps source subsidiaries to target subsidiaries, specifies which items should be used for invoices and vendor bills, and identifies the appropriate vendors for bill creation based on subsidiary and customer combinations.

customRecords.name: Vendor Bill Fields (Overall)
customRecords.description: Establishes standard field mappings that apply to all vendor bills regardless of subsidiary. This record supports both header and line-level field mappings and includes special variable substitution using {fieldname} syntax for dynamic values.

customRecords.name: Vendor Bill Fields (Subsidiary Based)
customRecords.description: Provides subsidiary-specific field mappings that override standard mappings when applicable. This record allows for customized field handling based on the source subsidiary, enabling different business rules for different subsidiaries.
